{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3128568,"name":"masoug","username":"masoug","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/masoug/{size}/4527_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-18T01:04:23.635Z","cooked":"

Hi all,

I’m a mentor working on a toy apriltag localization algorithm here: GitHub - masoug/apriltag-localization and I’m at a point where I’d like to validate the algorithm with real-world sample data.

Does anyone know of any datasets of the 2023 field with AprilTags camera images? I’m looking for

  • Multiple images of the field with and without apriltags
  • Camera is always within field boundaries
  • Camera images are not rectified or undistorted
  • The OpenCV radial camera model parameters are provided
  • Ground-truth camera pose data for each image
  • Ground truth poses are in the field’s 3D reference frame as specified by AprilTag Coordinates layout diagram: https://firstfrc.blob.core.windows.net/frc2023/FieldAssets/2023LayoutMarkingDiagram.pdf

I’ve found this https://firstfrc.blob.core.windows.net/frc2023/FieldAssets/2023VisionSampleImages.zip which is almost exactly what I’m looking for, except:

  • I can’t find camera calibration data so my localization estimates may not correspond with the provided ground truth.
  • Ground truth is only in 2D–ideally I’d like full 6-dof camera poses if possible (which includes 3D attitude information)

I think I can make 2023VisionSampleImages work for my purposes, but if anyone has access to a full field and can capture some images that’d be even better.

Thanks!

Update, I managed to generate some calibration parameters using COLMAP. TL;DR, the camera’s intrinsics used for the “Vision Sample Images” appear to be:
Projection Matrix:

[[1146.45,     0.0,   640.0],
 [   0.0,   1146.45,  360.0],
 [   0.0,      0.0,     1.0]]

Distortion Parameters:

[-0.00982442, -0.0571186, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0]

This uses the default OpenCV RADIAL camera model. Hope this helps!
